FeatureInfoProxy * mpProxy

Detailed Description

A single feature that can be requested by an application.

This corresponds to information collected from the Gaia.xml's <uses-feature> tag.

Definition at line 22 of file FeatureInfo.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gaia::core::FeatureInfo::FEATURE_FLAG

Feature flag.

Enumerator:
FLAG_REQUIRED 

Set on if this feature has been required by the application.

Returns:
Additional Flags. May be zero or more of FLAG_REQUIRED.
base::String gaia::core::FeatureInfo::getFeatureName ( ) const

Get the feature name.

Returns:
The name of this feature. If this is empty, then the feature is an OpenGL ES version feature.
